attributes.action: Legalise Cannabis Sativa & Indica For Medicinal & Taxed Recreational Use
attributes.additional_details:
Sativa is also can treat mental illness, it stimulates hunger which is useful for those with anorexia or certain cancers. due to the stimulant effect its best taken in the day.
indica can treat insomnia so best taken at night, helps chronic nausea, muscle spasm and seizures.
There are hybrids of the two that can be controlled unto which strain is more dominant. 
Not only will it save the NHS money, but when taxed it could really boost our economy when sold by licenced farmers.
attributes.background:
Cannabis the drug plant has two strains. the first is:
Sativa gives a stimulating head high: feeling of wellness, increases focus, boosts creativity.
indica is a relaxing body high: reduces nausea, aids sleep, relieves migraines, headaches, muscles and reduces pain.
